content: i ve made lots of amigurumi but this is the first pattern i created on my own i ve had a love of airplanes for a long time so it was really fun to blend two of my interests in this pattern it only took me a couple hours to make and is a great scrap yarn project finished size is about 3 5 long materials a relatively small ball of worsted weight yarn 3 5mm crochet hook handful of stuffing yarn needle stitch marker scissors
